ygData.subject: RE: 1hb weapons that are light enough to use...
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I heard about sky, it is just a money sucker, you can not zone in and out without paying large sums of PP and such. Haven t heard many things on
ygData.messageBody:
From what I heard about sky, it is just a money sucker, you can not zone in
and out without paying large sums of PP and such. Haven't heard many things
on description of monsters and such either.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Perkins [mailto:tperkins@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 4:43 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] 1hb weapons that are light enough to use...


From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>

I have heard that the runor is the plane of sky (POS) heh will drop alot of
weapons jewelry and miscilaneous (sp) items. A group from my guild is
planning on going into Sky Nekkid tonight.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 48th...
E-Marr
Da`Kor
----- Original Message -----
From: RaceFace <bean@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 1:33 PM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] 1hb weapons that are light enough to use...


> From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
> So, now that there's rumors of 1hb weapons coming.. are there any out
there
> that are usable by monks, and are light enough to actually carry around?
>
> -Raean Bloodyhands, 24th monk looking to learn how to bonk people, Tunare.
>
>
